title: Authentication Success with WorkOS
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate using WorkOS and access the platform.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid WorkOS credentials
Submit login form
User is authenticated and redirected to the platform dashboard

title: WorkOS Account Linking
description: Verify users can link multiple WorkOS accounts and switch between them.

steps.description: Login with primary WorkOS account
Navigate to account linking settings
Link a secondary WorkOS account
Secondary account is linked successfully
Switch to the linked secondary account
User context changes to the secondary account without errors

title: Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid WorkOS credentials are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email and password
Submit login form
Login is rejected with an appropriate error message

title: Universal Inbox Real-time Content Update
description: Verify that the Universal Inbox updates content in real-time from Readwise, photos, and manual entries.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the /inbox page
Add a new content entry manually
New content appears instantly in the Universal Inbox
Simulate incoming content from Readwise API
Readwise content appears in the inbox without refresh
Upload photo content
Photo content is displayed immediately in the inbox

title: Universal Inbox Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify that users can navigate the Universal Inbox using keyboard shortcuts efficiently.

steps.description: Navigate to /inbox page
Use keyboard arrows and shortcuts to move focus through content items
Focus moves correctly and selection responds to keyboard interaction
Apply filter by content source using keyboard controls
Content is filtered correctly without using mouse

title: Flashcard Generation from Highlights
description: Verify AI-powered flashcards are accurately generated from selected highlights or notes.

steps.description: Select a highlight or note in the platform
Trigger flashcard generation
Flashcards are generated correctly with meaningful question and answer content

title: FSRS Spaced Repetition Scheduling and Progress Tracking
description: Verify flashcards support FSRS spaced repetition and progress is tracked accurately over study sessions.

steps.description: Access flashcards list and begin study session
Mark flashcards as known or unknown according to FSRS algorithm prompts
Flashcard review intervals update correctly following FSRS algorithm
User progress is saved and reflected on next session

title: Rich Notes Editor Markdown Support
description: Verify that the ProseMirror-based Notes Editor supports markdown syntax input and rendering.

steps.description: Navigate to /notes and create a new note
Input markdown formatted text (headings, lists, code blocks, links)
Editor renders formatted content accurately

title: AI Content Detection in Notes Editor
description: Verify AI assistance detects content type and provides relevant enhancements in the notes editor.

steps.description: Enter various content types (e.g. code, quotes, to-dos) in the notes editor
AI detection highlights and suggests enhancements appropriately

title: Export Notes in Markdown Format
description: Verify that users can export notes as markdown files with correct formatting.

steps.description: Create or open a note with markdown content
Trigger the export to markdown feature
Downloaded file contains correctly formatted markdown representation of the note

title: Settings & Permissions RBAC Enforcement
description: Verify that Role-Based Access Control is enforced properly across settings and permissions management.

steps.description: Login as user with limited permissions
Attempt to access or modify restricted settings or permissions
Access is denied and appropriate error or warning message shown
Login as admin user
Modify user roles and permissions using the interface
Changes are persisted and enforced on affected users

title: User Settings Persistence
description: Verify user preferences are saved and loaded correctly across sessions.

steps.description: Modify settings such as theme (light/dark), notification preferences
Logout and login again
User settings are retained and applied correctly

title: Marketing Landing Page Load Time and Responsiveness
description: Verify that the marketing landing page loads within 2 seconds and is responsive on multiple devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Navigate to the root URL '/' on desktop
Page load time is under 2 seconds
Resize browser to tablet and mobile dimensions
Layout adjusts and remains usable with no clipping or overflow
Access the page on iOS device
Page is responsive and elements are properly sized

title: Waitlist Signup Form Functionality
description: Verify that the waitlist signup form accepts valid input, shows success feedback, and handles errors gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to marketing landing page
Enter valid email and submit the waitlist form
Success message is displayed and data is recorded
Submit waitlist form with invalid email format
Error message shown indicating invalid input

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify that the system meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard accessibility, screen reader support, and color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through core screens (/login, /inbox, /flashcards, /notes, /settings, /)
All interactive elements are accessible via keyboard alone
Screen reader announces content in a meaningful and consistent manner
Color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA thresholds

title: Session Management and Logout
description: Verify that user sessions are managed securely, and logout terminates the session properly.

steps.description: Login to the platform
Navigate through several pages
Perform logout action
User session is terminated and accessing protected routes redirects to login

title: Real-Time Collaboration Updates
description: Verify that real-time updates in notes and flashcards are visible to multiple collaborators without manual refresh.

steps.description: User A and User B open the same note or flashcard session
User A edits the note or studies and updates flashcards
User B sees the changes appear in real-time instantly

title: Security: Unauthorized Access Attempt
description: Verify that unauthorized users cannot access protected routes or data without authentication.

steps.description: Attempt to access /inbox, /flashcards, /notes, /settings without login
User is redirected to login page
Attempt to use direct API calls without authentication
Access is denied with unauthorized error response

title: Multi-Account Session Switching
description: Verify that multi-account switching works smoothly and user context changes correctly without data leakage.

steps.description: Login and link multiple accounts
Switch session from one account to another
Data shown corresponds only to the active account
No stale data from previous account is visible or accessible

title: Responsive Design Verification Across Devices
description: Verify that core interfaces adapt seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with correct layout and usability.

steps.description: Access core routes (/inbox, /flashcards, /notes, /settings) on desktop
Layouts are correct with full visibility and interaction
Repeat access on tablet-size viewport and smartphones
UI components resize or rearrange appropriately with no content clipping or overlap
